Formerly: Warner Bros. Records (1958-1967, 1970-1971) | Warner Bros.-Seven Arts (1967-1970) | Warner-Elektra-Atlantic (1971-1991) | Warner Music (1991-2001)
Headquarters: 1633 Broadway, New York City, New York | , | U.S.
Key people: Michael Lynton (Chairman) | Len Blavatnik (Vice chairman) | Stephen Cooper (CEO)
Owners: Access Industries (86.3% equity interest, 99.2% voting power) | Tencent (1.6%)
